meanings.sent1: She umlauted the letter to indicate a change in pronunciation.
meanings.sent2: The linguist umlauted the vowel to show a different sound.
meanings.sent3: The teacher umlauted the word on the board, making it look fancy.
meanings.sent4: His speech was umlauted with symbols, adding depth to his words.
meanings.sent5: The artist umlauted the text, creating a unique visual effect.

meanings.sent1: The umlauted letter had a special mark above it.
meanings.sent2: The language had many umlauted characters in its alphabet.
meanings.sent3: The umlauted font made the text stand out in the document.
meanings.sent4: Her name was umlauted, giving it a distinct European flair.
meanings.sent5: The umlauted word looked different from the others, catching his eye.
